title: Exclusive: West Brom offer highly-rated defender Nathan Ferguson new five-year deal as Premier League clubs show interest
text:
West Bromwich Albion are in talks with highly-rated defender Nathan Ferguson over a new five-year deal.

Championship leaders Albion have offered Ferguson a lucrative long-term contract and hope the 19 year-old will commit his future to the club within the next two weeks.

Ferguson has broken through this season and been a key performer for Slaven Bilic, with Crystal Palace already understood to be targeting him for a potential move in January as they look to replace Aaron Wan-Bissaka.

But Albion are determined to give Bilic every chance of achieving promotion back to the Premier League and will refuse any offers for the England under-20 international in the transfer window.

Negotiations with Ferguson's representatives are progressing well and Albion's hierarchy are optimistic that an agreement can be reached before the end of the month.
description: West Bromwich Albion are in talks with highly-rated defender Nathan Ferguson over a new five-year deal.
